description:
Tweetz Desktop is a Windows twitter client designed to sit comfortably in the corner of your desktop. It can optionally display attached images inline. Tweetz displays your home, mentions and direct messages in a single view reducing the need to switch timelines. Tweetz supports real time updates, posting with media and keyboard shortcuts.
    If .NET 4.5.2 is not installed, you may have to restart your computer after .NET 4.5.2 installs and then install Tweetz Desktop.
author: Mike Ward
